chara.textHome:
I, Alina, must introduce myself?
Irritante...

Simply look in any art magazine,
and you'd already know that
I am an artistic genius.

So, ask me questions once you've
finished reading, grazie.

Then I might be willing to
provide some details.
Do you understand?
I, Alina, am so emozionata at the moment.

How could I not with my magnum
opus nearly complete?
Can you not see? This brilliance...

Ahh... I, Alina, felt a burst of
power from within...

Always build on the basics first.
This applies to painting as well.

This sensation, as though stepping
onto yet a higher stage...

I feel as though I've uncovered a new style
 of expression for the first time.
What... Just what is this?
I, Alina...have never...felt such a rush!

Oh...stupendo, like debuting on
a greater stage...
Ahhh, I shudder with excitement...

What? You again?
You come here way too often.

I'm going to do what I want. 
You go ahead and do what you want.
End of conversation.

It's morning already? 
This can't be right,
where's my water?
I, Alina, always drink water in the morning.
Bring me some.

Since I like working on my art at night,
the afternoon is for my siesta.
Now scram, I'm eating...

I'll punish you if you continue
to interrupt me.

I bet that ridicola girl will be
in the classroom.

I really hate it when she shows me
her silly comics.
She just never improves...
It must be boring watching me work.

Are you stupid? 
You should just go to sleep.

*Giggle* 
Why are you trying to stay awake?
I must complete my best artwork.
Therefore, you see, I'm always busy.
I have absolutely no time for you.

I sense a lovely little Witch nearby.
Bellissima!

I get so excited when I choose whether to
destroy, keep, or feed it to my best artwork.

If any Magical Girls interfere with my work
I'll simply delete them, of course.
Alright, how should I finish up this piece?
So you know my Revived Dead series?

Many say it's creepy, but those who can
appreciate it understand it's full of life.

Who cares about food?
To me, it's just fuel.

I don't even notice the taste
when I'm working.

Painting, pottery, handcrafts,
installation art...

I think my sense of aesthetics was inspired
by all the art in my parents' gallery.
*Stare*

Since you're always staring at me, I tried to
stare back, but nope, nothing interesting.
Absolutely no ispirazione at all.
Mifuyu's body is a work of art!

Her posture, her appearance...stupenda.
I could sketch her for a hundred hours!

All three of the Magius are motivated only
by their own interests.

That's why what they want to achieve
doesn't hold my attention in the slightest.
Huh? Who said I'm not going to universita?
Believe it or not, I, Alina, am planning to go.
I want to observe how people live there.

I never create art based on
what people want.

Rather, I, Alina, draw other people
into my artwork.
Cut it out.

You're just like that ridicola girl who doesn't
know when to stop.

Who, you ask? 
I'm talking about Karin Misono, of course.
All right then. Let's start the party.
Oh, I just got so excited...

*Sigh*
I, Alina, have grown tired of this...
I could never get tired of this.
You are not worthy to be used in my artwork.
I, Alina, have deemed you to be intriguing.

However, see to it that you keep
your distance, okay
Ahh...
*Giggle*
Fantastico, just superb.

On to the next, quickly!
Satisfaction is an illusion!
Hmm...
Are you that desperate to learn about me?

This sensation... It excites me just as
my first encounter with a Witch did...
I feel so good right now!

Encountering a Witch completely changed
the course of my life.

If you ask me if it was good or bad,
I'd say it was good.
